Rule.name: HDB Profile 1
Rule.desc: Profile to update the count of fund transfers for card debt settlement or loan repayment. Also stores the count of transfers to blacklisted accounts.

Variable.FieldDesc: Count of fund transfers done to watchlisted accounts
Date of fund transfers done to watchlisted accounts
Date for fund transfers done for loan or CC payments
8-byte string
Number of transactions for loan or credit card payment

Rule.name: HDB Profile 4
Rule.desc: Stores the transaction timestamp if it is to a blacklisted account

Variable.FieldDesc: 8-byte string
Timestamp of the transaction when it is to a merchant who is listed in exposed info blacklist
Flag variable that is set if current txn is to a blacklisted merchant and _c_INFO_BLACKLIST_DT is within 90 days
20-byte string

Rule.name: HDB Profile 5
Rule.desc: Stores the credit transactions to merchant for the past 7 months

Variable.FieldDesc: Spike in transaction count in the current month as compared to the average of past 6 months
Date of transactions in the past 7 months
Date of transactions in the past 7 months
Date of transactions in the past 7 months
Date of transactions in the past 7 months
Date of transactions in the past 7 months
Date of transactions in the past 7 months
Date of transactions in the past 7 months

Amount of credit transactions in the past 7 months
Amount of credit transactions in the past 7 months
Amount of credit transactions in the past 7 months
Amount of credit transactions in the past 7 months
20-byte string

Rule.name: HDB Rule 3
Rule.desc: Raise alert when more than 10 Card not present transactions in 72 hours
Rule.alertReason: More than 11 CNP transactions made within 72 hours

Rule.name: HDB Rule 1A
Rule.alertReason: More than 4 transactions for loan or card repayment purposes

Rule.name: HDB Rule 1B
Rule.desc: More than 4 payments made to an account listed in watchlist

Variable.FieldDesc: Count of fund transfers done to watchlisted accounts
8-byte string

Rule.name: HDB Rule 4
Rule.desc: Transaction made to suspicious merchant and blacklisted merchant within 90 days
Rule.alertReason: Transaction made to suspicious merchant and blacklisted merchant within 90 days from the card

Rule.name: HDB Rule 5
Rule.desc: Spike in merchant transactions in a month
Rule.alertReason: Spike in credit transactions to merchant
